name: Piggy-Back Dice (ryan_butts)
description:
A fully immersive dice-balancing sim which is both the "Dark Souls", the "Fall Guys", and the "Pajama Sam" of dice simulators.

Position your character atop the correct dice face without falling off to earn points. 

See how many points you can get before time runs out!

Move Character Left/Right - - - - - - - - - - -  - - - - - -  - - - - -  A / D

Move Character Forward/Backward - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - W / S

Rotate Platform - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -ARROW KEYS / MOUSE

Jump - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - SPACE

Run - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  LEFT SHIFT

Pause - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ESC / P

Reset Score - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  ENTER
